speaker.name: Monika Bláhová
speaker.biography: I am Monika Bláhová, currently based at Global Change Research Institute, CAS in Brno, Czech Republic as a GIS data analyst and first-year Ph.D. student. My background is cartography and geoinformatics, and my first experience with coding is from 2013 with JavaScript. Since then, I have walked a long way through learning Python, lecturing PyLadies courses, working as an IT administrator, and finally landing in a big scientific team focusing on climate change’s impact on the agroecosystems at the Czech Academy of Science.
